summary: A dataset class that supplies triplet samples for deep metric learning, applying ImageNet‑style normalization and size‑specific augmentations (random/resized crops for training, resize or center‑crop for validation) to match the input requirements of common architectures such as ResNet‑50 and GoogLeNet.
business_intent: Enable developers to quickly integrate correctly pre‑processed training and validation data into metric‑learning pipelines, reducing preprocessing errors and accelerating model experimentation and deployment.
